LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop Quick View -> Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.AccordionPanelsHeightStyle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value:
"auto" - All panels will be set to the height of the tallest panel.
"fill" - Expand to the available height based on the accordion's parent height.
"content" - Each panel will be only as tall as its content.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.EnableCloudZoom
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the cloud zoom on the main product image

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.EnableCloudZoom.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled the cloud zoom will be activated on the main product picture

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this option you will enable the Nop Quick View plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.EnableQuickViewPopupOverlay.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked an overlay effect will be applied to your website, so that only the Quick View Popup will be clickable.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.MakeQuickViewPopupDraggable
LocaleResource.Value: Make the Quick View popup draggable

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.MakeQuickViewPopupDraggable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the Quick View Popup will be draggable.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ProductItemSelector.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the selector of the product item element. The quick view button will be shown when hover over this item. NOTE: the selector should contain attribute "data-productid" with the ID of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ProductItemSelectorChild.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the element where the button will be placed. If left empty or the same value as the "Product item selector" is entered, the button will be placed in the "Product item selector". If entered a different value, the button will be placed in it.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowAddToWishlistButton
LocaleResource.Value: Show add to wishlist button when simple product

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowAddToWishlistButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the add to wishlist button will be shown in the Quick View for simple products. Regardless of this setting the wishlist button is never shown for grouped products.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowCompareProductsButton.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the compare products button will be shown in the Quick View.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowFullProductDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the full product description will be shown in the Quick View.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowProductsAlsoPurchased.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked products also purchased will be shown in the Quick View.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowProductSpecification.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the product specification will be shown in the Quick View.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowRelatedProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked related products will be shown in the Quick View.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.QuickView.Admin.Settings.ShowShortProductDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If clicked the short product description will be shown in the Quick View.
